name: Skin Candy Holder
short_description: Skin Candy Holder is a stylish product display with Phi Logo, intended for Skin Candy aftercare product line, which are products to offer for your clients who want the best for themselves when it comes to aftercare.
long_description: Product presentation is a vital component that does all the talking for your business, brings brand awareness and helps the brand’s key message to be effectively delivered to customers. It is something that immediately catches the attention and will promote your products with a very clear image. The message is simple: - Choose only the best from beauty manifested through simplicity, style, superior quality and constant innovation.Durable, easy to clean, fits perfectly in every studio.
